Text: Hammond Preparatory School visit the new SHARE shop Pupils at The Hammond Preparatory School have paid a special visit to the Share shop in Chester. The school wanted to ‘share’ some love on Valentine’s Day, so they visited the SHARE shop where they listened to an inspiring and informative talk about homelessness and how they can help. Hammond Preparatory School visit the new SHARE shop After raising money by doing a sponsored swim, the school will be sponsoring coffee and hot drinks for the homeless for two weeks at the shop on Northgate Street with plans to continue to support the SHARE initiative in Chester and North Wales.
